author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Onex Confirms Election Of Directors, Approval Of “Say-On-Pay”
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Onex Corp:
* ONEX CONFIRMS ELECTION OF DIRECTORS AND APPROVAL OF “SAY-ON-PAY” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
